welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kings Park West, where the charm of small-town America meets the excitement of a vibrant city. We invite you to explore our beautiful parks, friendly neighborhoods, and rich history while enjoying all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves a mix of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves domestic and international flights for various airlines, including Delta and United.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the network 'DCA-Free-WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warrenton-Fauquier Airport is a small building with a waiting area, check-in counter, and a few shops and restaurants.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
